profile.name: Bonsen
profile.shortBio: I craft fast, elegant digital experiences with clean engineering and modern UI principles.

heroData.headline: Bonsen
heroData.subtext: I craft fast, elegant digital experiences with clean engineering and modern UI principles. Currently exploring interactive 3D web scenes and cyber security.

about.title: About Me
description: I'm a UI/UX Designer and Software Engineer passionate about building meaningful digital experiences.
Currently exploring 3D web experiences using Three.js, Blender, and diving deep into cyber security.

experience.title: BSc in Software Engineering
experience.description: Pursuing Bachelor of Science degree in Software Engineering, focusing on software development and system design.

experience.title: Cyber Security Trainee
experience.description: Intensive training on cyber security fundamentals, cryptography, and blue team/green team operations.

projects.title: PcPass
projects.description: A comprehensive PC registration and management system. I designed the complete user interface and experience in Figma, creating intuitive workflows and a modern visual design system.
projects.fullDescription: PC registration management system for tracking and organizing computer assets. Led the UI/UX design process including wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups in Figma.

projects.title: Sekur-Labs
projects.description: A comprehensive cyber security platform that teaches people cyber security through interactive labs and hands-on learning experiences.
projects.fullDescription: Interactive platform for cybersecurity education with interactive labs, challenges, and real-time feedback. Built with modern web technologies for an engaging learning experience.

organizations.name: HUCISA
organizations.description: Served as one of the co-founders of the organization.

contactInfo.title: Let's Connect
contactInfo.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can work together.
